text:
“The deaths don’t matter to him,” Tony Schwartz, co-author of “The Art of Deal,” says of President Trump’s coronavirus response. “When he is inventing stories, and lies, and a reality that is of his own making — he’s doing it without any shame or guilt.”
https://t.co/jwJiINyNI3
